properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary; Coastal waters from Edisto Beach SC to Savannah GA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 21 at 3:03AM EST until January 22 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 4 to 6 ft. For the Gale Watch,
north winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 5 to 7
ft possible.

* WHERE...Edisto Beach to Savannah out 20 NM and Savannah to
Altamaha Sound out 20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 PM EST this
evening. For the Gale Watch, from this evening through late
tonight.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT
